title: Shipper
description: At Shipper, embarked on an enriching journey within the shipping team, where I diligently managed the processing of shipment orders, catering to the needs of our esteemed agents and merchants. Through this role, I gained invaluable insights into the intricate logistics and operations of the shipping industry, contributing to the seamless flow of goods and services.

title: CV. Ergossum
description: an my professional journey as a freelancer, later transitioning into a contracted role directly under the ownership. Throughout this tenure, I successfully managed a diverse array of projects spanning from UI/UX design to comprehensive end-to-end testing. This multifaceted experience not only honed my skills across various domains but also provided me with invaluable insights into project management and client collaboration, contributing to my holistic growth as a professional.

title: Esteh Creative
description: As an intern at this esteemed company, I underwent a transformative learning experience. I gained hands-on expertise in creating and enhancing websites using ReactJS, delved into the intricacies of end-to-end testing, and gained valuable insights into the entire development lifecycle. This immersive journey equipped me with invaluable skills and knowledge, paving the way for my professional growth in the field of web development.
